title: All the Backlist! August 16, 2019
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including Girlchild.
This episode is sponsored by Book Riot Insiders.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Swallows by Lisa Lutz
The Spellman Files by Lisa Lutz
The Gurkha and the Lord of Tuesday by Saad Z. Hossein
Escape from Baghdad! by Saad Z. Hossein
gods with a little g by Tupelo Hassman
Girlchild by Tupelo Hassman
White Noise by Suzan-Lori Parks
Getting Mother’s Body by Suzan-Lori Parks
Family of Origin by CJ Hauser
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
